trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Liverpool
There were no other sightings in Liverpool on or around November 20th 1997
Summary: star like object very high in the sky stop start movement at lightning speed before moving off into space
divs: Sighting Detailsi was walking home from a friends house about 11pm, it was a very clear night and there was also very little light polution. i looked up.. i noticed the sky was full of stars and admired the clear night for a few moments. i noticed one paticular bright looking star and focused on it for a few moments when it suddenly shot across the sky from one point to another, stopped for a short moment maybe 10 seconds then again suddenly moved to another point in the sky, stopped again then maybe 5 seconds later shot off and dissapered off into space in a blink of an eye. the object was extremly high in the sky if not already in space given that it looked very similar to the other stars. if this really was the case then it must have moved hundreds of miles in each movement...
